metadata.title: CVE-2023-5616 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Ubuntu, gnome-control-center did not properly reflect SSH remote loginstatus when the system was configured to use systemd socket activation foropenssh-server. This could unknowingly leave the local machine exposed toremote SSH access contrary to expectation of the user.

criterions.comment: gnome-control-center: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
